1. Open Spotify and search for your favorite playlist.
2. Play music on Apple Music or Google Play Music.
3. Use voice assistant to play your go-to music station.
4. Create a new playlist on YouTube Music.
5. Stream music on Amazon Music.

Reason: Quickly accessing music streaming services.

1. Open YouTube and search for "MrBeast latest video".
2. Go to MrBeast's official YouTube channel and check the latest uploads.
3. Click on the "Uploads" tab to see the latest videos.
4. Visit MrBeast's social media pages for video links.
5. Subscribe to MrBeast's channel for notifications.

Reason: Quickly finding the latest MrBeast content.

1. Open your device's clock app and select the alarm option.
2. Set the alarm time to 10:00 PM.
3. Choose a ringtone or select an alarm sound.
4. Set the alarm to repeat or one-time.
5. Save the alarm settings.

Reason: Setting the alarm for a specific time.

I think you meant to say "write a poem" or "write a message"! If so:

1. Open a note-taking app like Evernote or OneNote.
2. Type in the message or poem you want to write.
3. Choose a font and formatting options.
4. Add any images or emojis to the message.
5. Save the note or message.

Reason: Creating a new written content.

1. Press the back button on your device.
2. Swipe down from the top of the screen to close the app.
3. Click on the "X" button at the top right corner of the app.
4. Use the "Recent Apps" menu to close the app.
5. Force-close the app on your device's settings.

Reason: Ending the Notepad app process.
